title: Authors and Citation
text: McGowan LD (2025). mdr: Macro Data Refinement. R package version 0.1.0, https://lucymcgowan.github.io/mdr/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {mdr: Macro Data Refinement},   author = {Lucy D'Agostino McGowan},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://lucymcgowan.github.io/mdr/}, }

title: Macro Data Refinement
text: goal mdr provide data Severance TV show.

title: Macro Data Refinement
text: can install development version mdr like :

title: Macro Data Refinement
code: library(mdr)  df <- elevator_dings |>   dplyr::mutate(time_in_minutes = as.numeric(time) / 3600) |>   dplyr::mutate(episode_time = episode + time_in_minutes / 100) |>   dplyr::filter(!is.na(pitch), !is.na(io))  library(ggplot2)  ggplot(df, aes(x = episode_time, y = pitch, color = io, shape = action)) +   geom_point(size = 3, alpha = 0.7) +   scale_shape_manual(values = c("enters" = 16, "sleeps" = 17, "wakes up" = 15)) +   scale_color_manual(values = c("blue", "red")) +   scale_x_continuous("Episode and Time",                      breaks = unique(df$episode),                      labels = unique(df$episode)) +   labs(     y = "Pitch",     color = "",     shape = "Action"   ) +   theme_mdr() +   theme(     text = element_text(size = 20),     axis.title = element_text(size = 20),     axis.text = element_text(size = 20),     axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1, size = 20))

title: Badge data — badges
text: Data employee badges. variable `joined` approximate days prior Helly joining employees joined Lumon. Mark 730, (2 years), since Season 1 Episode 1 (40:39) Mark says joined two years ago, Irving 3,285 (9 years), since marketing Linkedin post Lumon stated joined 9 years prior.

title: Badge data — badges
text: object class tbl_df (inherits tbl, data.frame) 7 rows 8 columns.

title: Elevator Ding Data — elevator_dings
text: first part data set based data compiled Reddit user Sam_Badi, remainder added package author.

title: Elevator Ding Data — elevator_dings
text: object class spec_tbl_df (inherits tbl_df, tbl, data.frame) 77 rows 8 columns.

title: Severance Episode Data — episodes
text: ## `episodes` data frame 19 rows 7 columns: season Season episode Episode number title Title duration Duration release_date Release Date writer Writer director Director

title: Custom MDR ggplot2 Theme — theme_mdr
text: Colors pulled MDR consoles shown Severance TV show  well (presumable) hex codes Lexington Letters.

title: Custom MDR ggplot2 Theme — theme_mdr
code: library(ggplot2) ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = wt, y = mpg)) +   geom_point() +   labs(title = "Car Efficiency", subtitle = "MPG vs Weight") +   theme_mdr()

title: Severance Transcripts — transcripts
text: object class tbl_df (inherits tbl, data.frame) 4323 rows 5 columns.
